title: Ferrari N.v.: Periodic Report on the Buyback Program
description: Ferrari N.v.: Periodic Report on the Buyback Program  Morningstar
content:
aranello (Italy), September 1, 2025 – Ferrari N.V. (NYSE/EXM: RACE) (“Ferrari” or the “Company”) informs that the Company has purchased, under the Euro 360 million share buyback program announced on July 31, 2025, as the eighth tranche of the multi-year share buyback program of approximately Euro 2 billion expected to be executed by 2026 in line with the disclosure made during the 2022 Capital Markets Day (the “Eighth Tranche”), the additional common shares - reported in aggregate form, on a daily basis - on the Euronext Milan (EXM) and on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) as follows:

(*) translated at the European Central Bank EUR/USD exchange reference rate as of the date of each purchase

 

Since the announcement of such Eighth Tranche till August 29, 2025, the total invested consideration has been:
• Euro 22,450,220.37 for No. 55,300 common shares purchased on the EXM
• USD 5,808,408.76 (Euro 4,978,370.35*) for No. 12,166 common shares purchased on the NYSE.

As of August 29, 2025, the Company held in treasury No. 15,773,441 common shares equal to 8.73% of the total issued share capital including the common shares and the special voting shares, net of shares assigned under the Company’s equity incentive plan.



Since the start of the multi-year share buyback program of approximately Euro 2 billion announced during the 2022 Capital Markets Day, on July 1, 2022, until August 29, 2025, the Company has purchased a total of 5,078,486 own common shares on EXM and NYSE, including transactions for Sell to Cover, for a total consideration of Euro 1,669,998,288.08.

A comprehensive overview of the transactions carried out under the buyback program, as well as the details of the above transactions, are available on Ferrari’s corporate website under the Buyback Programs section (https://www.ferrari.com/en-EN/corporate/buyback-programs).
summary: Ferrari N.V. (NYSE/EXM: RACE) has purchased a Euro 360 million share buyback program, the eighth tranche of the multi-year share buyout program of approximately Euro 2 billion, expected to be executed by 2026. The additional common shares purchased under the program were reported on the Euronext Milan (EXM) and the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) as follows. Since the announcement of the Eighth Tranche, the total invested consideration has been approximately €22,450,220.37 for No. 55,300 common shares bought on the EXM and No. 12,166 common shares on the NYSE. The Company held in treasury No. 19,774.
shortSummary: Ferrari N.V.E.R.S.A.G.S., based on its extensive share buyback program, has purchased additional common shares under the current plan.

argos_summary: Ferrari N.V. reported the eighth tranche of its multi‑year share buyback program, purchasing approximately €2 billion in total shares on the Euronext Milan and NYSE. As of August 29 2025, the company had bought 55,300 shares on EXM and 12,166 shares on NYSE, spending €22.45 million and $5.81 million respectively. The buyback has raised the company’s treasury holdings to 15,773,441 shares, representing 8.73% of issued capital. Overall, since the program’s launch in July 2022, Ferrari has repurchased 5,078,486 shares for a total consideration of €1.67 billion.
